( ii ) Partial response : 50 % serum creatinine decrease baseline final value > 133 lmol/L ( > 1.5 mg/dL ) . ( iii ) No response : Serum creatinine decrease < 50 % baseline Treatment extend reversal HRS ( decrease creatinine 1.5 mg/dL ) maximum 7 day rescue treatment follow . If intolerant terlipressin , exclude study rescue treatment give form noradrenaline octreotide midodrine .
